rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: One of the most useful classes I have taken in the b-school. You will have to do a lot of work but the grading is fair and ultimately her grades are good. I got an A and had to work for it but it was so worth it.
its online course and it's a joke ...not a business school teacher  .. will be good for high school
Dr. Harms is pretty helpful. She is willing to help students in order to let everyone get an A
